verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2384>vision<s%>. What aileth thee <S%H645>now<s%>, that thou art wholly gone <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1406>housetops<s%>?

Thou that art <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H8663>stirs<s%>, a <S%H1993>tumultuous<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, a <S%H5947>joyous<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%>: thy <S%H2491>slain<s%> men are not <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, nor <S%H4191>dead<s%> in <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

All thy <S%H7101>rulers<s%> are <S%H5074>fled<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, they are <S%H631>bound<s%> by the <S%H7198>archers<s%>: all that are <S%H4672>found<s%> in thee are <S%H631>bound<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, which have <S%H1272>fled<s%> from <S%H7350>far<s%>.

Therefore <S%H559>said<s%> I, Look <S%H8159>away<s%> from me; I will <S%H1065>weep<s%> <S%H4843>bitterly<s%>, <S%H213>labour<s%> not to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me, because of the <S%H7701>spoiling<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>.

For it is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4103>trouble<s%>, and of treading <S%H4001>down<s%>, and of <S%H3998>perplexity<s%> by the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2384>vision<s%>, <S%H6979>breaking<s%> down the <S%H7023>walls<s%>, and of <S%H7771>crying<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>.

And <S%H5867>Elam<s%> <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H827>quiver<s%> with <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and <S%H7024>Kir<s%> <S%H6168>uncovered<s%> the <S%H4043>shield<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, that thy <S%H4005>choicest<s%> <S%H6010>valleys<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and the <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> shall <S%H7896>set<s%> themselves in <S%H7896>array<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H1540>discovered<s%> the <S%H4539>covering<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and thou didst <S%H5027>look<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H5402>armour<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>.

Ye have <S%H7200>seen<s%> also the <S%H1233>breaches<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, that they are <S%H7231>many<s%>: and ye gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H1295>pool<s%>.
And ye have <S%H5608>numbered<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> have ye broken <S%H5422>down<s%> to <S%H1219>fortify<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%>.

Ye <S%H6213>made<s%> also a <S%H4724>ditch<s%> between the two <S%H2346>walls<s%> for the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H1295>pool<s%>: but ye have not <S%H5027>looked<s%> unto the <S%H6213>maker<s%> thereof, neither had <S%H7200>respect<s%> unto him that <S%H3335>fashioned<s%> it long <S%H7350>ago<s%>.

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> did the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> to <S%H1065>weeping<s%>, and to <S%H4553>mourning<s%>, and to <S%H7144>baldness<s%>, and to <S%H2296>girding<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>:

And behold <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, <S%H2026>slaying<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H7819>killing<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, <S%H398>eating<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%>: let us <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>; for to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> we shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.

And it was <S%H1540>revealed<s%> in mine <S%H241>ears<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, Surely this <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall not be <S%H3722>purged<s%> from you till ye <S%H4191>die<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

¶ Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H935>get<s%> thee unto this <S%H5532>treasurer<s%>, even unto <S%H7644>Shebna<s%>, which is over the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and say,

What hast thou here? and whom hast thou here, that thou hast hewed thee <S%H2672>out<s%> a <S%H6913>sepulchre<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%>, as he that heweth him <S%H2672>out<s%> a <S%H6913>sepulchre<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>, and that <S%H2710>graveth<s%> an <S%H4908>habitation<s%> for himself in a <S%H5553>rock<s%>?
Behold, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will carry thee <S%H2904>away<s%> with a <S%H1397>mighty<s%> <S%H2925>captivity<s%>, and will <S%H5844>surely<s%> <S%H5844>cover<s%> thee.

He will <S%H6801>surely<s%> violently <S%H6801>turn<s%> and <S%H6802>toss<s%> thee like a <S%H1754>ball<s%> into a <S%H7342%H3027>large<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>: there shalt thou <S%H4191>die<s%>, and there the <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of thy <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall be the <S%H7036>shame<s%> of thy <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And I will <S%H1920>drive<s%> thee from thy <S%H4673>station<s%>, and from thy <S%H4612>state<s%> shall he pull thee <S%H2040>down<s%>.
¶ And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that I will <S%H7121>call<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H471>Eliakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>:

And I will <S%H3847>clothe<s%> him with thy <S%H3801>robe<s%>, and <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> him with thy <S%H73>girdle<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>commit<s%> thy <S%H4475>government<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and he shall be a <S%H1>father<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And the <S%H4668>key<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> will I <S%H5414>lay<s%> upon his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%>; so he shall <S%H6605>open<s%>, and none shall <S%H5462>shut<s%>; and he shall <S%H5462>shut<s%>, and none shall <S%H6605>open<s%>.

And I will <S%H8628>fasten<s%> him as a <S%H3489>nail<s%> in a <S%H539>sure<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>; and he shall be for a <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%> to his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And they shall <S%H8518>hang<s%> upon him all the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, the <S%H6631>offspring<s%> and the <S%H6849>issue<s%>, all <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H6996>small<s%> quantity, from the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H101>cups<s%>, even to all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5035>flagons<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, shall the <S%H3489>nail<s%> that is <S%H8628>fastened<s%> in the <S%H539>sure<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> be <S%H4185>removed<s%>, and be cut <S%H1438>down<s%>, and <S%H5307>fall<s%>; and the <S%H4853>burden<s%> that was upon it shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.
